cosmos.question: I am big and yellow, and I shine up high! What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out during the day.
🔥 I am very hot.
🌻 Flowers like to face me.

cosmos.question: I am round and white, and I come out at night! What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 Some people say I look like cheese.
🌑 Sometimes I am full, sometimes I am just a sliver.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky, far, far away! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very small and bright.
🌃 You see many of me at night.
🙏 People make wishes on me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and dirt, where we all live! What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 Your house is on me.
💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 Plants grow on me.

cosmos.question: I'm a hot ball of gas, bigger than Earth! What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ There are many of me in the sky.
🔥 I make my own light.
☀️ Our Sun is one of me!

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth many times each month! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I'm always near the Earth.
🌑 I change shape in the night sky.
🚀 Astronauts have visited me.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, and another planet far away! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me one day.
🏜️ I'm known as the 'Red Planet'.
👽 Some people think aliens live on me.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars making a picture! What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.
🌌 You can find me with a telescope.
✨ The Big Dipper is an example of me.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust! What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am shaped like a spiral.
✨ Our Sun lives in me.
🌌 The Milky Way is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a fast ball of ice and dust with a long, bright tail! What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I only visit Earth sometimes.
☄️ My tail points away from the Sun.
🧊 I am like a dirty snowball.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A tasty treat monkeys enjoy.
💛 My skin is the color of sunshine.
📏 I'm long and curved.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on a tree. Sometimes I'm in your lunchbox. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow high in a tree
🍎 Teachers love to receive me.
🔴 My skin is usually a bright color.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 A furry friend enjoys munching on me.
🥕 I help you see in the dark (maybe!).
🧡 I am the color of pumpkins.

food.question: I am white and you drink me. Cows give me to you. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Good to drink cold.
🐄 A big animal makes me.
⚪ I am the same color as snow.

food.question: I am small and green, and grow in bunches. Sometimes I am sour. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 Many of me grow together.
🟢 I can be green or purple.
😋 Some people think I am yummy, others think I am sour.

food.question: I am made of dough and baked in the oven. You can put yummy things on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 A popular dish
🔥 I need to be baked before you can eat me.
🧀 You can put cheese and pepperoni on me!

food.question: I am a fruit that is also a color! What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I grow on trees in warm places.
🎨 My name is also a color.
☀️ I am a healthy snack to eat.

food.question: I'm a yummy dessert. I can be chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry. I'm usually cold. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a cold treat
🍫 I come in lots of flavors.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I have a shell and come from a chicken. You can scramble me or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 Animals like chickens make me.
🍳 You can cook me in a pan.
⚪ I am white or brown on the outside.

food.question: I'm a grain that you eat with a spoon. I can be white or brown, and you can eat me with lots of different foods. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 Many people around the world eat me.
🍚 I go great with chicken and vegetables.
🍚 I'm a small grain that comes in different colors.
